name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:

Demonstrated proficiency with **webhooks**, **OAuth**, and working with platforms such as **HubSpot**, **Airtable**, **Slack**, **Notion**, and **Stripe**. Proven track record in deploying automated data pipelines and integrating solutions into existing systems, ensuring seamless data flows and real-time processing. 

Technically skilled in building high-performance applications utilizing **Python**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Experienced in leveraging cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud-native deployments. Holds a solid grasp of structured problem-solving, communication, and ownership, driven by a curious mindset to explore new technologies and optimize workflows.
